abstract: Prosecutors expect to recommend “extraordinary” leniency for Frank DiPascali Jr., who has admitted being Bernard L. Madoff’s crucial lieutenant in history’s largest Ponzi scheme, The New York Times reports, citing documents made public in federal court in Manhattan on Friday.
